ygData.subject: HyperNEAT C++ v4: Problem in building with Visual Studio 2012
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I have compiled HyperNEAT with cmake GUI (generator: Visual Studio 11). Before that, I followed instructions on the Jason Gauci s site and successfully

Hello,

I have compiled HyperNEAT with cmake GUI (generator: Visual Studio =
11). Before that, I followed instructions on the Jason Gauci's site and suc=
cessfully compiled all the dependencies (zlib, tinyxmldll, JGTL, Fuego, and=
 libBoard etc.). 
Now when I try to build the project solution with VS 2012=
, I get some strange errors (All in the "CakeFixedDepthLib" project):

1, e=
rror C2065: '_Ty' : undeclared identifier

2, error C2143: syntax error : m=
issing ';' before '{'

3, error C2226: syntax error : unexpected type 'std:=
:remove_reference<_Ty>::type'

4, error C2447: '{' : missing function heade=
r (old-style formal list?)

5, error C2923: 'std::remove_reference' : '_Ty'=
 is not a valid template type argument for parameter '_Ty'

6, error LNK110=
4: cannot open file 'CakeFixedDepthLib_d.lib'

7, error LNK1104: cannot ope=
n file 'CakeFixedDepthLib_d.lib'

8, error LNK1104: cannot open file 'CakeF=
ixedDepthLib_d.lib'

9, error LNK1104: cannot open file 'CakeFixedDepthLib_=
d.lib'


The first five errors are in the native locked/read-only VS header=
 named "type_traits".

On visual studio 2010, I faced the same(first 5) err=
ors but the native read-only VS header file, in that case, was "utility".

=
